text: Coronavirus cases in China surged past 63,000 with a reported 1,700 medical workers infected.
In Cambodia, hundreds of cruise ship passengers stranded at sea for days...
...over fears of the new virus were finally allowed to disembark.
In Syria, Turkish forces and Syrian rebel groups clashed with Syrian government forces...
...in a continuing confrontation that saw the shoot-down of a government helicopter.
In Sweden, thousands of protesters joined Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg...
...for a school strike and march through Stockholm.
Finally from Russia, a Russian soldier proposed to his girlfriend...
...using 16 military tanks parked in a heart-shaped formation.
